GV02gopthbru:3_0: oṃ brahma ha vā idam agra āsīt svayaṃ tv ekam eva tad aikṣata mahad vai yakṣaṃ tad
GV02gopthbru:3_1: ekam evāsmi hantāhaṃ mad eva manmātraṃ dvitīyaṃ devaṃ nirmama iti tad abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:3_2: abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya lalāṭe sneho yad ārdryam
GV02gopthbru:3_3: ājāyata tenānandat tam abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:4: tad yad abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti tasmāt suvedo 'bhavattaṃ vā etaṃ suvedaṃ santaṃ sveda ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:5: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.1 //
GV02gopthbru:6: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo romagartebhyaḥ pṛthak svedadhārāḥ prāsyandanta /
GV02gopthbru:7_0: tābhir anandat tad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir
GV02gopthbru:7_1: vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti /
GV02gopthbru:8: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāt dhārā abhavaṃs taddhārāṇāṃ dhārātvaṃ yac cāsu dhriyate /
GV02gopthbru:9_0: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāj jāyā
GV02gopthbru:9_1: abhavaṃs tajjāyānāṃ jāyātvaṃ yac cāsu puruṣo jāyate yac ca putraḥ punnāmanarakam
GV02gopthbru:9_2: anekaśatatāraṃ tasmāt trāti putras tat putrasya putratvam /
GV02gopthbru:10: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmād āpo 'bhavaṃs tad apām aptvam āpnoti vai sa sarvān kāmān yān kāmayate // GpBr_1,1.2 //
GV02gopthbru:11_0: tā apaḥ sṛṣṭvānvaikṣata tāsu svāṃ chāyām apaśyat tām asyekṣamāṇasya svayaṃ reto 'skandat
GV02gopthbru:11_1: tad apsu pratyatiṣṭhat tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tāḥ śrāntās taptāḥ
GV02gopthbru:11_2: saṃtaptāḥ sārdham eva retasā dvaidham abhavaṃs tāsām anyā anyatarā atilavaṇā apeyā
GV02gopthbru:11_3: asvādvyas tā aśāntā retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhann athetarāḥ peyāḥ svādvyaḥ śāntās
GV02gopthbru:11_4: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyo
GV02gopthbru:11_5: yad reta āsīt tad abhṛjjyata yad abhṛjjyata tasmād bhṛguḥ samabhavat tad bhṛgor bhṛgutvaṃ
GV02gopthbru:11_6: bhṛgur iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // GpBr_1,1.3 //
GV02gopthbru:12_0: sa bhṛguṃ sṛṣṭvāntaradhīyata sa bhṛguḥ sṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāyo vāyo
GV02gopthbru:12_1: iti saṃnyavartata sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat mātariśvan mātariśvann
GV02gopthbru:12_2: iti sa nyavartata sa pratīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat pavamānaḥ pavamāna iti
GV02gopthbru:12_3: sa nyavartata sa udīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāta vāteti tam abravīn nanv
GV02gopthbru:12_4: avidāmaha iti na hīty athārvāṅ enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad yad abravīd athārvāṅ
GV02gopthbru:12_5: enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad atharvābhavat tad atharvaṇo 'tharvatvam /
GV02gopthbru:13_0: tasya ha vā etasya bhagavato 'tharvaṇa ṛṣer yatheva brahmaṇī lomāni yathāṅgāni yathā
GV02gopthbru:13_1: prāṇa evam evāsya sarva ātmā samabhavat tam atharvāṇaṃ brahmābravīt prajāpateḥ prajāḥ
GV02gopthbru:14_0: tad yad abravīt prajāpateḥ prajā sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tasmāt prajāpatir abhavat tat
GV02gopthbru:14_1: prajāpateḥ prajāpatitvam atharvā vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatir iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu
GV02gopthbru:15_0: tam atharvāṇam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāt
GV02gopthbru:15_1: daśatayān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn niramimataikarcān dvyṛcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:16_0: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:16_1: saṃtaptebhyaḥ daśatayān ātharvaṇān ārṣeyān niramimataikādaśān dvādaśāṃs trayodaśāṃś
GV02gopthbru:16_2: caturdaśān pañcadaśān ṣoḍaśān saptadaśān aṣṭādaśān navadaśān viṃśān iti /
GV02gopthbru:17_0: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn ātharvaṇāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:17_1: śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyat sa ātharvaṇo vedo 'bhavat
GV02gopthbru:17_2: tam ātharvaṇaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:17_3: om iti mana evordhvam akṣaram udakrāmat sa ya icchet sarvair etair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇī
GV02gopthbru:18: sarvair ha vā asyaitair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.5 //
GV02gopthbru:19: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyad bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa ātmata eva trīṃl lokān niramimata pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divam iti /
GV02gopthbru:20: sa khalu pādābhyām eva pṛthivīṃ niramimatodarād antarikṣam mūrdhno divam /
GV02gopthbru:21: sa tāṃs trīn lokān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas trīn devān niramimatāgniṃ vāyum ādityam iti /
GV02gopthbru:22: sa khalu pṛthivyā evāgniṃ niramimatāntarikṣād vāyuṃ diva ādityam /
GV02gopthbru:23_0: sa tāṃs trīn devān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:23_1: saṃtaptebhyas trīn vedān niramimata ṛgvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti agne ṛgvedaṃ
GV02gopthbru:24: sa tāṃs trīn vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas tisro mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti /
GV02gopthbru:25: bhūr ity ṛgvedāt bhuva iti yajurvedāt svar iti sāmavedāt /
GV02gopthbru:26_0: sa ya icchet sarvair etais tribhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ
GV02gopthbru:26_1: kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitais tribhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ
GV02gopthbru:26_2: vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.6 //
GV02gopthbru:27: tā yā amū retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tāḥ prācyo dakṣiṇācyaḥ pratīcya udīcyaḥ samavadravanta /
GV02gopthbru:28: tad yat samavadravanta tasmāt samudra ucyate /
GV02gopthbru:29: tā bhītā abruvan bhagavantam eva vayaṃ rājānaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:30: yac ca vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tadvaraṇo 'bhavat taṃ vā etaṃ varaṇaṃ santaṃ varuṇa ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:31: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:32: sa samudrād amucyata sa mucyur abhavat taṃ vā etaṃ mucyuṃ santaṃ mṛtyur ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:33: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:34_0: taṃ varuṇaṃ mṛtyum abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya
GV02gopthbru:34_1: sarvebhyo 'ṅgebhyo raso 'kṣarat so 'ṅgaraso 'bhavat taṃ vā etam aṅgarasaṃ santam
GV02gopthbru:35: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.7 //
GV02gopthbru:36_0: tam aṅgirasam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:36_1: viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn niramimata tān viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:36_2: samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo daśatayān āṅgirasān ārṣeyān
GV02gopthbru:36_3: niramimata ṣoḍaśino 'ṣṭādaśino dvādaśina ekarcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:37_0: tān aṅgirasa ṛṣīn āṅgirasāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas
GV02gopthbru:37_1: taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyatsa āṅgiraso vedo 'bhavat tam āṅgirasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:37_2: vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāj janad iti
GV02gopthbru:38_0: sa ya icchet sarvair etair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā
GV02gopthbru:38_1: kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya eva veda
GV02gopthbru:38_2: yaś caiva vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.8 //
GV02gopthbru:39_0: sa ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat sa imāṃl lokān vyaṣṭabhnāt tasmād aṅgiraso 'dhīyāna ūrdhvas tiṣṭhati
GV02gopthbru:39_1: tad vrataṃ sa manasā dhyāyed yad vā ahaṃ kiṃcana manasā dhyāsyāmi tathaiva tad bhaviṣyati
GV02gopthbru:41: śreṣṭho ha vedas tapaso 'dhijāto brahmajyānāṃ kṣitaye saṃbabhūva ṛjyad bhūtaṃ yad asṛjyatedaṃ niveśanam anṛṇaṃ dūram asyeti /
GV02gopthbru:42: tā vā etā aṅgirasāṃ yāmayo yan menayaḥ karoti menibhir vīryaṃ ya eva veda // GpBr_1,1.9 //
GV02gopthbru:43: sa diśau 'nvaikṣata prācīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvām iti /
GV02gopthbru:44: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ pañca vedān niramimata sarpavedaṃ piśācavedam asuravedam itihāsavedaṃ purāṇavedam iti /
GV02gopthbru:45: sa khalu prācyā eva diśaḥ sarpavedaṃ niramimata dakṣiṇasyāḥ piśācavedaṃ pratīcyā asuravedam udīcyā itihāsavedaṃ dhruvāyāś cordhvāyāś ca purāṇavedam /
GV02gopthbru:46: sa tān pañca vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyaḥ pañca mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata vṛdhat karad guhan mahat tad iti /
GV02gopthbru:47_0: vṛdhad iti sarpavedāt karad iti piśācavedāt guhad ity asuravedāt mahad itītihāsavedāt
GV02gopthbru:47_1: tad iti purāṇavedāt sa ya icchet sarvair etaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir
GV02gopthbru:47_2: eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati
GV02gopthbru:47_3: ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.10 //
GV02gopthbru:48: sa āvataś ca parāvataś cānvaikṣata tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ śam ity ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat /
GV02gopthbru:49_0: sa ya icchet sarvābhir etābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ
GV02gopthbru:49_1: mahāvyāhṛtyā kurvīta sarvābhir ha vā asyaitābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ
GV02gopthbru:49_2: bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.11 //
GV02gopthbru:50_0: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyat bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa manasa eva candramasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:50_1: niramimata nakhebhyo nakṣatrāṇi lomabhya oṣadhivanaspatīn kṣudrebhyaḥ prāṇebhyo 'nyān bahūn devān /
GV02gopthbru:51: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa etaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum ekaviṃśatisaṃsthaṃ yajñam apaśyat /
GV02gopthbru:54: athāpy eṣa prākrīḍitaḥ ślokaḥ pratyabhivadati sapta sutyāḥ sapta ca pākayajñā iti // GpBr_1,1.12 //
GV02gopthbru:55_0: tam āharat yenāyajata tasyāgnir hotāsīt vāyur adhvaryuḥ sūrya udgātā candramā brahmā
GV02gopthbru:55_1: parjanyaḥ sadasya oṣadhivanaspatayaś camasā adhvaryavo viśvedevā hotrakā atharvāṅgiraso
GV02gopthbru:55_2: goptāras taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ pūrve śrotriyā yajñaṃ tataṃ sāvasāya ha smāhety
GV02gopthbru:55_3: abhivrajanti mā no 'yaṃ gharma udyataḥ pramattānām amṛtāḥ prajāḥ prasākṣīd iti tān
GV02gopthbru:55_4: vāyetān parirakṣakān sadaḥprasarpakān ity ācakṣate dakṣiṇāsamṛddhāṃs tad u ha smāha
GV02gopthbru:55_5: prajāpatir yad vai yajñe 'kuśalā ṛtvijo bhavanty acaritino brahmacaryam aparāgyā
GV02gopthbru:55_6: vā tad vai yajñasya viriṣṭam ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:56_0: yajñasya viriṣṭam anuyajamāno viriṣyate yajamānasya viriṣṭam anvṛtvijo viriṣyanta
GV02gopthbru:56_1: ṛtvijāṃ viriṣṭam anudakṣiṇā viriṣyante dakṣiṇānāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir
GV02gopthbru:56_2: viriṣyate putrapaśūnāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ svarge lokena viriṣyate svargasya lokasya
GV02gopthbru:56_3: viriṣṭam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo viriṣyate yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.13 //
GV02gopthbru:57_0: taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brahmāṇaṃ yajñaviriṣṭo vā yajñaviriṣṭino vety upādhāveran
GV02gopthbru:57_1: namas te astu bhagavan yajñasya no viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhehīti tad yatraiva viriṣṭaṃ syāt
GV02gopthbru:57_2: tatrāgnīn upasamādhāya śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā pṛthivyai śrotrāyeti trir evāgnīn samprokṣati
GV02gopthbru:57_3: triḥ paryukṣati triḥ kārayamāṇam ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca yajñavāstu ca samprokṣaty
GV02gopthbru:57_4: athāpi vedānāṃ rasena yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhīyate tad yathā lavaṇena suvarṇaṃ saṃdadhyāt
GV02gopthbru:57_5: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena lohaṃ lohena sīsaṃ sīsena eṣv evam evāsya yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ
GV02gopthbru:57_6: saṃdhīyate yajñasya saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ saṃdhīyate yajamānasya saṃdhitim anv
GV02gopthbru:57_7: ṛtvijaḥ saṃdhīyanta ṛtvijāṃ saṃdhitim anu dakṣiṇāḥ saṃdhīyante dakṣiṇānāṃ saṃdhitim
GV02gopthbru:57_8: anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhiḥ saṃdhīyate putrapaśūnāṃ saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa
GV02gopthbru:57_9: lokena saṃdhīyate svargasya lokasya saṃdhitim anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemaḥ saṃdhīyate
GV02gopthbru:57_10: yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.14 //
GV02gopthbru:58_0: tad u ha smāhātharvā devo vijānan yajñaviriṣṭānandānītpupaśamayeran yajñe prāyaścittiḥ
GV02gopthbru:58_1: kriyate 'pi ca yad u bahv iva yajñe vilomaḥ kriyate na caivāsya kācanārtir bhavati
GV02gopthbru:58_2: na ca yajñaviṣkandham upayāty apahanti punar mṛtyum apātyeti punar ājātiṃ kāmacāro
GV02gopthbru:58_3: 'sya sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān brahmā bhavati yasya caiva
GV02gopthbru:58_4: vidvān brahmā dakṣiṇataḥ sado 'dhyāste yasya caiva vidvān brahmā dakṣiṇata udaṅmukha
GV02gopthbru:58_5: āsīno yajña ājyāhutīr juhotīti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.15 //
GV02gopthbru:59_0: brahma ha vai brahmāṇaṃ puṣkare sasṛje sa khalu brahmā sṛṣṭaś cintām āpede kenāham
GV02gopthbru:59_1: ekenākṣareṇa sarvāṃś ca kāmān sarvāṃś ca lokān sarvāṃś ca devān sarvāṃś ca vedān
GV02gopthbru:59_2: sarvāṃś ca yajñān sarvāṃś ca śabdān sarvāś ca vyuṣṭīḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāny
GV02gopthbru:59_3: anubhaveyam iti sa brahmacaryam acarat sa oṃ ity etad akṣaram apaśyad dvivarṇaṃ caturmātraṃ
GV02gopthbru:59_4: sarvavyāpi sarvavibhvayātayāmabrahma brāhmīṃ vyāhṛtiṃ brahmadaivataṃ tayā sarvāṃś

GV02gopthbru:236_2: udūcus teṣv atha yāni ca stotrāṇi ca śastrāṇy ā vaṣaṭkārāt teṣu sa yad ṛkto bhreṣaṃ
GV02gopthbru:236_3: niyacched oṃ bhūr janad iti gārhapatye juhuyāt yadi yajuṣṭa oṃ bhuvo janad iti dakṣiṇāgnau
GV02gopthbru:236_4: juhuyāt yadi sāmata oṃ svar janad ity āhavanīye juhuyāt yady anājñātā brahmatā oṃ
GV02gopthbru:236_5: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar janad oṃ ity āhavanīya eva juhuyāt tadvākovākyasyarcāṃ yajuṣāṃ sāmnām
GV02gopthbru:236_6: atharvāṅgirasām athopa vedānāṃ rasena yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhīyate tad yathā lavaṇenety
GV02gopthbru:236_7: uktaṃ tad yathā ubhayapāt puruṣo yann ubhayacakro vā ratho vartamāno 'bhreṣaṃ nyety
GV02gopthbru:236_8: evam evāsya yajño 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yajñasyābhreṣam anu yajamāno 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yajamānasyābhreṣam
GV02gopthbru:236_9: anv ṛtvijo 'bhreṣaṃ niyanti ṛtvijām abhreṣam anu dakṣiṇā abhreṣaṃ niyanti dakṣiṇānām
GV02gopthbru:236_10: abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir abhreṣaṃ nyeti putrapaśūnām abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ
GV02gopthbru:236_11: svargeṇa lokenābhreṣaṃ nyeti svargasya lokasyābhreṣam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo
GV02gopthbru:236_12: 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.3 //
GV02gopthbru:237_0: tad yad audumbaryān ma āsiṣṭa hiṅkṛṇot me prāstāvīn ma udake āsīt me subrahmaṇyām
GV02gopthbru:237_1: āhvāsīd ity udgātre dakṣiṇā nīyante grahān me 'grahīt prācārīn me 'śuśruvan me samanasaskārṣīd
GV02gopthbru:237_2: ayākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma ity adhvaryave hotṛṣadana āsiṣṭa ayākṣīn me
GV02gopthbru:237_3: 'śāṃsīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma iti hotre devayajanaṃ me 'cīkṛpad brahmā sādaṃ me 'sīsṛpad
GV02gopthbru:237_4: brahmajapān me 'japīt purastāddhomasaṃsthitahomān me 'hauṣīd ayākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn me
GV02gopthbru:237_5: 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma iti brahmaṇe bhūyiṣṭhena mā brahmaṇākārṣīd ity etad vai bhūyiṣṭhaṃ
GV02gopthbru:237_6: brahma yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ ye 'ṅgiraso ye 'ṅgirasaḥ sa rasaḥ ye 'tharvāṇā ye 'tharvāṇas
GV02gopthbru:237_7: tad bheṣajaṃ yad bheṣajaṃ tad amṛtaṃ yad amṛtaṃ tad brahma sa vā eṣa pūrveṣām ṛtvijām
GV02gopthbru:237_8: ardhabhāgasyārdham itareṣām ardhaṃ brahmaṇa iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.4 //
GV02gopthbru:238_0: devāś ca ha vā asurāś ca saṃgrāmaṃ samayatanta tatraitās tistro hotrakā jihmaṃ pratipedire
GV02gopthbru:238_1: tāsām indra ucchāni sāmāni lulopa tāni hotre prāyacchad ājyaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva
GV02gopthbru:238_2: praugaṃ potur vaiśvadevaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva niṣkevalyaṃ neṣṭur marutvatīyaṃ ha
GV02gopthbru:238_3: vai hotur babhūva āgnimārutam āgnīdhrasya tasmād etad abhyastataram iva śasyate yad
GV02gopthbru:238_4: āgnimārutaṃ yasmād ete saṃśaṃsukā iva bhavanti yaddhotā potā neṣṭāgnīdhro mumohe
GV02gopthbru:238_5: vasīta tad brahmeyasām ivāsa tāsām ardhaṃ pratilulopa prathamārhaṇaṃ ca prathamapadaṃ
GV02gopthbru:238_6: caitad dakṣiṇāṃ caitat pariśiṣeded iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.5 //
GV02gopthbru:239_0: uddālako ha vā āruṇir udīcyān vṛto dhāvayāṃcakāra tasya ha niṣka upāhito babhūva
GV02gopthbru:239_1: upavādād bibhyato yo mā brāhmaṇo 'nūcāna upavadiṣyati tasmā etaṃ pradāsyāmīti taddhodīcyān
GV02gopthbru:239_2: brāhmaṇān bhayaṃ bibheda uddālako ha vā ayam āyāti kaurupāñcālī brahmā brahmaputraḥ
GV02gopthbru:239_3: sa ūrdhvaṃ vṛto na paryādadhīta kenemaṃ vīreṇa prati saṃyatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva
GV02gopthbru:239_4: prapannaṃ dadhre tata evam anupratipedire taṃ ha svaidāyanaṃ śaunakam ūcuḥ svaidāyana
GV02gopthbru:239_5: tvaṃ vai no brahmiṣṭho 'sīti tvayemaṃ vīreṇa pratisayatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva prapannaṃ
GV02gopthbru:239_6: dadhre tata evam anupratipedire taṃ ha svaidāyanā ity āmantrayāmāsa sa ho gotamasya
GV02gopthbru:239_7: putretīti hāsmā asūyāt pratiśrutaṃ pratiśuśrāva sa vai gautamasya putra ūrdhvaṃ vṛto
